brand_info.name: Franuí
brand_info.tagline: ENJOY THE PERFECT BITE. whenever you want, wherever you want and however you want.
brand_info.positioning: Premium offering that balances indulgence with the growing demand for health-conscious products; a pioneering premium snacking experience.
brand_info.vision: To become a global brand, present in 80 markets by 2030, bringing a 'taste of Patagonia' to consumers worldwide.
brand_info.mission: To provide a snacking experience like no other, combining indulgence, convenience, and quality, while maintaining a focus on quality and sustainability, offering a delightful fusion of hand-picked raspberries, each enveloped in two layers of high-quality chocolate, with no preservatives, dyes, or artificial flavors.
brand_info.origin_story: Established in 2013 by Diego Fenoglio in Bariloche, Patagonia, Argentina. It originated from a family recipe for artisan chocolate, with Diego Fenoglio innovating by using raspberries grown in his backyard.

brand_values.brand_promise: An unparalleled taste experience of fresh, hand-picked raspberries delicately coated in a double layer of ethically sourced, premium chocolate, free from preservatives or artificial flavors.
differentiators: Original creators of chocolate-covered raspberry bites
Hand-picked, regeneratively farmed raspberries from Patagonia
Double layer of ethically sourced, high-quality chocolate
No preservatives, dyes, or artificial flavors
Family-run business with artisan chocolate heritage
non_negotiables: Use of pure, carefully selected cocoa for chocolate

psychographics.lifestyle: Health-conscious, values quality and natural ingredients, seeks moments of indulgence, appreciates premium snacks and desserts.
psychographics.behavior: Enjoys spontaneous treats, seeks convenient yet premium snacking options, shares experiences on social media, values ethical sourcing.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Direct, inviting, warm, emphasizing sensory pleasure and natural goodness.
tone_of_voice.language_register: Accessible yet refined, avoiding overly casual slang or overly formal jargon.
tone_donts: Focus solely on health benefits without indulgence

logo.primary_logo: Wordmark 'Franuí' with a subtle, organic accent on the 'i', often accompanied by a small raspberry icon or stylized element.
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clear space around the logo, ensure legibility on all backgrounds, avoid distortion or alteration.
logo.lockup_behavior: Often appears standalone or integrated subtly within packaging and campaign visuals, not competing with the product hero.
logo.safe_area: Minimum clear space equivalent to the height of the 'f' in Franuí.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Primary colors are dominant, reflecting the product. Secondary colors are used sparingly for natural context or clean backgrounds. High contrast for legibility.

typography.primary_font: Sans-serif, clean and modern, with slight organic touches.
typography.secondary_font: Sans-serif, highly legible for body text.

spacing.letter_spacing: Standard to slightly open for headlines

layout_principles.grid_system: Flexible, often centered or rule-of-thirds for product focus.
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: High, to emphasize product and create a premium, clean feel.
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-dominant, with text serving as concise support.
layout_principles.cta_placement: Clear and prominent, typically at the bottom or right of the layout.
layout_principles.alignment: Often centered or left-aligned for text, product is the central focus.

style.camera_feel: Intimate, inviting, capturing texture and detail.
style.pose_guidelines: Product-focused, often showing interaction (hands holding, picking up, sharing). When people are present, poses are natural, relaxed, conveying genuine enjoyment and satisfaction.
style.casting_attitude: Authentic, diverse, conveying natural happiness and appreciation for quality.

technical.lighting: Soft, natural, often diffused, highlighting textures and creating a warm glow. Sometimes dramatic to emphasize chocolate sheen.
technical.contrast: Moderate to high, ensuring product details are crisp and colors vibrant.
technical.grain: Minimal to none, for a clean, premium feel.
technical.depth_of_field: Shallow, to keep the product in sharp focus and create a pleasing bokeh effect for backgrounds.
technical.color_grading: Warm and rich, enhancing the natural colors of raspberries and chocolate, avoiding overly cool or desaturated tones.

model_casting.diversity: Inclusive of various ethnicities and backgrounds.
model_casting.attitude: Authentic, happy, satisfied, relaxed, enjoying the moment.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Always highly visible and central, often in close-up.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Natural, appealing, sometimes showing a cross-section of the product or melted chocolate. Presented simply, often in its packaging or on a clean dish.
avoid: Overly artificial or staged product setups
Cluttered backgrounds that distract from the product

motion_rules.pacing: Moderate to slow, allowing viewers to appreciate the product's details and the sensory experience.
motion_rules.transitions: Smooth, natural, focusing on the product's journey from package to bite, or showing ingredients.

visual_dos: Show close-ups of the product's texture and layers.
Feature natural light and warm tones.
Include hands interacting with the product.
Emphasize the freshness of the raspberries.
visual_donts: Show the product in unappetizing contexts.
Use stock photography that doesn't align with brand aesthetic.
copy_dos: Use sensory language to describe taste and texture.
Highlight the natural and premium ingredients.
Connect the product to moments of joy and indulgence.
Emphasize the Patagonian origin and family heritage.
copy_donts: Use overly complex or technical jargon.
Focus on negative aspects or comparisons.

must_remain: Commitment to real fruit and premium chocolate.
Focus on quality and natural ingredients.
can_evolve: New fruit and chocolate combinations (e.g., Franuí Pink).
Packaging designs (subtle adjustments to logo and imagery).
Expansion into new markets and distribution channels.

materials: High-quality cardboard packaging with matte finish.
Chilled display units with prominent branding.
Informative shelf talkers highlighting origin and ingredients.
interactive_elements: Digital screens showcasing product journey from Patagonia.
QR codes linking to brand story or recipes.
retail.soundscape: Soft, inviting, perhaps subtle nature sounds or light, uplifting instrumental music.

digital.tone_adjustment: Slightly more conversational and engaging for social media, maintaining premium feel.

platform_behavior.Instagram: High-quality visuals, short engaging videos, influencer collaborations, user-generated content features, polls/stories for interaction.
platform_behavior.Website: Clean design, strong product imagery, detailed origin story, clear 'where to buy' information, recipe suggestions.
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Exclusive content, new product announcements, behind-the-scenes, special offers, direct links to purchase.

print.paper: High-quality, often matte or semi-gloss stock for premium feel.
print.cover_rules: Minimalist, product-centric, strong visual impact with clear branding.

logo_misuse_examples: Changing logo colors to non-brand palette.
Placing logo on busy or unapproved backgrounds.
Using outdated versions of the logo.
